column2: At the hearing of the appeal, the appellant who is in the remand custody was not
informed the Court that he has full  instructions from  the appellant to  argue his

column1: appeal  before  us,  which  resulted  in  hearing  the  parties  in  consideration  of the

column2: appeal.  Even  though  the  accused  was  physically  not  present in  Court,  he  had
the opportunity of observing the proceedings from the prison premises via a video
